Body:
I am trying to enable billing for GCP projects using terraform but the project was created using GCP console.

I am getting error like project already exists, Is there any way to enable project using terraform for existing project ?

resource "google_project" "my_project" {

  name       = "ML Cluster"
  project_id = "ml-cluster"
  org_id     = "XXXXXXXXXXXX"
  billing_account = "XXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
}
Title: How to enable billing to GCP project using terraform

history.Text:
I am trying to enable billing for GCP projects using terraform but the project was created using GCP console. 

I am getting error like project already exists, Is there any way to enable project using terraform for existing project ?

```
resource "google_project" "my_project" {

  name       = "ML Cluster"
  project_id = "ml-cluster"
  org_id     = "XXXXXXXXXXXX"
  billing_account = "XXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
}
```

filtered-sentences.text: I am trying to enable billing for GCP projects using terraform but the project was created using GCP console.
``` resource "google_project" "my_project" { name = "ML Cluster" project_id = "ml-cluster" org_id = "XXXXXXXXXXXX" billing_account = "XXXXXXXXXXXXXX" } ```

history.Text: How to enable billing to GCP project using terraform

filtered-sentences.text: How to enable billing to GCP project using terraform

answers.Body: You have to import your existing project into the Terraform state first, so that the imported project has the correct identifier (google_project.my_project). Once that's done, you can apply your Terraform configuration to enable billing for the project.

history.Text:
You have to [import your existing project][1] into the Terraform state first, so that the imported project has the correct identifier (`google_project.my_project`). Once that's done, you can apply your Terraform configuration to enable billing for the project.


  [1]: https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/import

filtered-sentences.text: Once that's done, you can apply your Terraform configuration to enable billing for the project. [1]: https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/import
Once that's done, you can apply your Terraform configuration to enable billing for the project.
How to enable billing to GCP project using terraform
I am trying to enable billing for GCP projects using terraform but the project was created using GCP console.
